00006     template <typename F, int L, typename S>
00007     class TExpectsMaker;
00008 
00009     template <typename F, typename S>
00010     class TExpectsMakerBase
00011     {
00012     public:
00013         template <int I>
00014         struct P
00015         {
00016             typedef typename Detail::Get< typename Detail::Functor<F>::ParameterTypes, I >::Type Type;
00017         };
00018 
00019         void SetSelf(S* p)
00020         {
00021             Self = p;
00022         }
00023 
00024         S* Self;
00025     };
00026 
00027     template <typename F, typename S>
00028     class TExpectsMaker<F, 0, S> : public TExpectsMakerBase<F,S>
00029     {
00030     public:
00031         S Expects()            
00032         {
00033             return Self->_Expects(All());
00034         }        
00035     };

00049 #define DETAIL_MAKE_EXPECT_MAKER(i)     \
00050     template <typename F, typename S>   \
00051     class TExpectsMaker<F, i, S> : public TExpectsMakerBase<F,S>    \
00052     {                                                   \
00053     public:                                             \
00054         template<DETAIL_TPARAMS(i)>                     \
00055         S Expects(DETAIL_FUNC_PARAMS(i,t))               \
00056         {                                               \
00057             return Self->_Expects(All(DETAIL_ARGS_P(i))); \
00058         }                                               \
00059     }
00060 
00061 DETAIL_MAKE_EXPECT_MAKER(1);
00062 DETAIL_MAKE_EXPECT_MAKER(2);
